00045 template<> double SeCurve<double>::comp(const double& val,const int)
00046 {return val;}
00047 
00048 template<> double SeCurve<SeVec3d>::comp(const SeVec3d& val,const int i)
00049 {return val[i];}
00050     
00051 template<class T> bool SeCurve<T>::
00052 cvLessThan(const CV &cv1, const CV &cv2)
00053 {
00054     return cv1._pos < cv2._pos;
00055 }
00056 
00057 template<class T> SeCurve<T>::
00058 SeCurve()
00059     :cacheCV(0),prepared(false)
00060 {
00061     _cvData.push_back(CV(-FLT_MAX,T(),kNone));
00062     _cvData.push_back(CV(FLT_MAX,T(),kNone));
00063 }
00064 
00065 template<class T> void SeCurve<T>::
00066 addPoint(double position,const T& val,InterpType type)
00067 {
00068     prepared=false;
00069     _cvData.push_back(CV(position,val,type));
00070 }
00071 
00072 template<class T> void SeCurve<T>::
00073 preparePoints()
00074 {
00075     prepared=true;
00076     cacheCV=0;
00077     // sort
00078     std::sort(_cvData.begin(), _cvData.end(), cvLessThan);
00079     
00080     // Setup boundary conditions on sentinel values
00081     CV& end=*(_cvData.end()-1);
00082     CV& begin=*(_cvData.begin());
00083     int realCVs=_cvData.size();
00084     if(realCVs>2){
00085         begin._val=_cvData[1]._val;
00086         begin._deriv=T();
00087         begin._interp=kNone;
00088         int lastIndex=_cvData.size()-1;
00089         end._val=_cvData[lastIndex-1]._val;
00090         end._deriv=T();
00091         end._interp=kNone;
00092     }else if(realCVs==1){
00093         CV& mid=*(_cvData.begin()+1);
00094         begin._pos=mid._pos-1.;
00095         end._pos=mid._pos+1.;
00096         begin._interp=end._interp=kNone;
00097         begin._val=end._val=mid._val;
00098         begin._deriv=end._deriv=T();
00099     }else if(_cvData.size()==0){
00100         begin._pos=end._pos=0;
00101         begin._val=end._val=T();
00102         begin._interp=kNone;
00103         begin._deriv=end._deriv=T();
00104     }
00105             
00106     // Initialize "Catmull-Rom" derivatives (centered differences)
00107     for(unsigned int i=1;i<_cvData.size()-1;i++){
00108         _cvData[i]._deriv=(_cvData[i+1]._val-_cvData[i-1]._val)
00109             /(_cvData[i+1]._pos-_cvData[i-1]._pos);
00110     }
00111 
00112     // Fix extrema by going through all intervals
00113     for(unsigned int i=0;i<_cvData.size()-1;i++){
00114         if(_cvData[i]._interp==kMonotoneSpline){
00115             double h=_cvData[i+1]._pos-_cvData[i]._pos;
00116             if(h==0)
00117                 _cvData[i]._deriv=_cvData[i+1]._deriv=T();
00118             else{
00119                 T delta=(_cvData[i+1]._val-_cvData[i]._val)/h;
00120                 clampCurveSegment(delta,_cvData[i]._deriv,
00121                     _cvData[i+1]._deriv);
00122             }
00123         }
00124     }
00125 }

00127 // TODO: this function and the next could be merged with template magic
00128 //       but it might be simpler to just have two copies!
00129 template<class T> T SeCurve<T>::
00130 getValue(const double param) const
00131 {
00132     assert(prepared);
00133     // find the cv data point index just greater than the desired param
00134     const int numPoints = _cvData.size();
00135     const CV *cvDataBegin = &_cvData[0];
00136     int index = std::upper_bound(cvDataBegin, cvDataBegin + numPoints, 
00137         CV(param, T(),kLinear),cvLessThan) - cvDataBegin;
00138     index=std::max(1,std::min(index,numPoints-1));
00139 
00140     const float t0 = _cvData[index - 1]._pos;
00141     const T k0 = _cvData[index - 1]._val;
00142     const InterpType interp = _cvData[index - 1]._interp;
00143     const float t1 = _cvData[index]._pos;
00144     const T k1 = _cvData[index]._val;
00145     switch (interp) {
00146         case kNone:
00147             return k0;
00148             break;
00149         case kLinear:
00150             {
00151                 double u = (param-t0)/(t1-t0);
00152                 return k0 + u*(k1-k0);
00153             }
00154             break;
00155         case kSmooth:
00156             {
00157                 double u = (param-t0)/(t1-t0);
00158                 return k0*(u-1)*(u-1)*(2*u+1) + k1*u*u*(3 - 2*u);
00159             }
00160             break;
00161         case kSpline:
00162         case kMonotoneSpline:
00163             {
00164                 double x=param-_cvData[index-1]._pos; // xstart
00165                 double h=_cvData[index]._pos-_cvData[index-1]._pos; // xend-xstart
00166                 T y=_cvData[index-1]._val; // f(xstart)
00167                 T delta=_cvData[index]._val-_cvData[index-1]._val; // f(xend)-f(xstart)
00168                 T d1=_cvData[index-1]._deriv; // f'(xstart)
00169                 T d2=_cvData[index]._deriv; // f'(xend)
00170                 return (x*(delta*(3*h - 2*x)*x + h*(-h + x)*(-(d1*h) + (d1 + d2)*x)))
00171                     /(h*h*h) + y;
00172             }
00173             break;
00174         default:
00175             assert(false);
00176             return T();
00177             break;
00178     }    
00179 }
00180 
00181 // TODO: this function and the previous could be merged with template magic
00182 //       but it might be simpler to just have two copies!
00183 template<class T> double SeCurve<T>::
00184 getChannelValue(const double param,int channel) const{
00185     assert(prepared);
00186     // find the cv data point index just greater than the desired param
00187     const int numPoints = _cvData.size();
00188     const CV *cvDataBegin = &_cvData[0];
00189     int index = std::upper_bound(cvDataBegin, cvDataBegin + numPoints, 
00190         CV(param, T(),kLinear),cvLessThan) - cvDataBegin;
00191     index=std::max(1,std::min(index,numPoints-1));
00192     
00193     const float t0 = _cvData[index - 1]._pos;
00194     const double k0 = comp(_cvData[index - 1]._val,channel);
00195     const InterpType interp = _cvData[index - 1]._interp;
00196     const float t1 = _cvData[index]._pos;
00197     const double k1 = comp(_cvData[index]._val,channel);
00198     switch (interp) {
00199         case kNone:
00200             return k0;
00201             break;
00202         case kLinear:
00203             {
00204                 double u = (param-t0)/(t1-t0);
00205                 return k0 + u*(k1-k0);
00206             }
00207             break;
00208         case kSmooth:
00209             // standard cubic interpolation
00210             {
00211                 double u = (param-t0)/(t1-t0);
00212                 return k0*(u-1)*(u-1)*(2*u+1) + k1*u*u*(3 - 2*u);
00213             }
00214             break;
00215         case kSpline:
00216         case kMonotoneSpline:
00217             {
00218                 double x=param-_cvData[index-1]._pos; // xstart
00219                 double h=_cvData[index]._pos-_cvData[index-1]._pos; // xend-xstart
00220                 double y=comp(_cvData[index-1]._val,channel); // f(xtart)
00221                 double delta=comp(_cvData[index]._val,channel)
00222                     -comp(_cvData[index-1]._val,channel); // f(xend)-f(xtart)
00223                 double d1=comp(_cvData[index-1]._deriv,channel); // f'(xtart)
00224                 double d2=comp(_cvData[index]._deriv,channel); // f'(xend)
00225                 
00226                 return (x*(delta*(3*h - 2*x)*x + h*(-h + x)*(-(d1*h) + (d1 + d2)*x)))
00227                     /(h*h*h) + y;
00228             }
00229             break;
00230         default:
00231             assert(false);
00232             return 0;
00233             break;
00234     }
00235 }
00236 
00237 template<class T> typename SeCurve<T>::CV SeCurve<T>::
00238 getLowerBoundCV(const double param) const
00239 {
00240     assert(prepared);
00241     const CV *cvDataBegin = &_cvData[0];
00242     int numPoints=_cvData.size();
00243     int index = std::upper_bound(cvDataBegin, cvDataBegin + numPoints, 
00244     CV(param, T(),kLinear),cvLessThan) - cvDataBegin;
00245     index=std::max(1,std::min(index,numPoints-1));
00246     if(index-1 > 0) return _cvData[index-1];
00247     return _cvData[index];
00248 }
00249 
00250 template<class T> bool SeCurve<T>::
00251 interpTypeValid(InterpType interp)
00252 {
00253       return interp==kNone || interp==kLinear || interp==kSmooth 
00254           || interp==kSpline || interp==kMonotoneSpline;
00255 }
00256 
00257 template<>
00258 inline void SeCurve<double>::clampCurveSegment(const double& delta,double& d1,double& d2)
00259 {
00260     if(delta==0) d1=d2=0;
00261     else{
00262         d1=SeExpr::clamp(d1/delta,0,3)*delta;
00263         d2=SeExpr::clamp(d2/delta,0,3)*delta;
00264     }
00265 }
00266 
00267 template<>
00268 void SeCurve<SeVec3d>::clampCurveSegment(const SeVec3d& delta,SeVec3d& d1,SeVec3d& d2)
00269 {
00270     for(int i=0;i<3;i++){
00271         if(delta[i]==0) d1[i]=d2[i]=0;
00272         else{
00273             d1[i]=SeExpr::clamp(d1[i]/delta[i],0,3)*delta[i];
00274             d2[i]=SeExpr::clamp(d2[i]/delta[i],0,3)*delta[i];
00275         }
00276     }
00277 }
00278 
00279 template class SeCurve<SeVec3d>;
00280 template class SeCurve<double>;
00281 
00282 }
